name: AssaultMod
description:
AssaultMod is a realistic shooter game where you can make your own combat experiences easily. You can go with close-quarter tactical combat, or all out war in an open map, and even make your own custom gamemode! Our goal is to make the game costumizable, immersive and realistic.

Discord : https://discord.com/invite/tyXWa9jZjM

CONTROLS
-

BASIC

CHANGE WEAPONS : KEY 1 = PRIMARY. KEY 2 = SECONDARY

MOVEMENT : WASD

RELOAD : R

AIM : RMB

FIRE : LMB

LEAN : Q E

SANDBOX

EDIT SCENE : TAB

EDIT ATTACHMENTS : P

CANCEL : X

DELETE OBJECT : del key

PLACE OBJECT : LMB
